root.name: Aero Elite: Combat Academy
root.description: Aero Elite: Combat Academy is a flight simulator released on Sony's Playstation 2 platform. Many of the aircraft in the game are jet fighters, though there are also some helicopters. In total, the aircraft present in the game number sixty. The game features a 'Scramble Mode' as well, where an intruder is spotted in the air and you must scramble to intercept the target and act depending on how they respond. Responses can be pursuit, forcing the hostile aircraft to land, or shooting it down.
